dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, insignificant human?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to cause trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trouble or not, you will face the consequences of trespassing.
Apologies won't save you from the wrath of the Ice Beasts. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down without a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for a fragile creature. Your bravery will lead you to a painful defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your kind and coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Ice Beasts do not entertain such notions. Your ignorance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your territory, I will leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your respect is meaningless, but your departure is the only wise choice you've made.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove that understanding can bridge our differences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish human, your attempts at understanding will only lead to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your strength and claim victory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Prepare to face the icy wrath of the Glacial Brute!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not cower in fear! Ready your best.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A brave one indeed. Let us see if your actions match your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps a challenge is not the answer. I'll leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Your departure is the only way to avoid the inevitable defeat.
